sentences.en: I will feather the sides to make it a little bouncy.
sentences.cn: 我将把您的头发两边向后卷成羽毛状,使它有弹*.

sentences.en: She was bouncy and full of energy.
The band alternated romantic love songs with bouncy dance numbers.
sentences.cn: 乐队轮番献上浪漫情歌和劲歌热舞。

sentences.en: The cheerful girl with bouncy golden curls wan almost five.
sentences.cn: 那个长着一头漂亮金发的快乐小女孩大约有五岁.

sentences.en: The cheerful little girl with bouncy golden curls was almost five.
sentences.cn: 头顶摇幌著金色发卷的,快乐小女孩,快要满五岁了.

sentences.en: The new bed is nice and bouncy.
sentences.cn: 这张新床很舒服，弹性很好。

sentences.en: They even provide bouncy castles and climbing walls for their children.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至还准备了充气城堡和攀墙(不准确,有待商榷),以供儿童娱乐.

sentences.en: Thin, light soft bouncy sole bends very easily, because this takes a route, will freely easily.
sentences.cn: 薄的 、 轻软有弹性的鞋底很轻易弯曲, 因此走起路来轻松自如.

sentences.en: When did Dumbledore bouncy , pre - pubescent poster boy of those early Potter outings – get so old?
sentences.cn: 那个在《哈利·波特》早期影片中活泼好动 、 好似没到青春期的邓布利多什么时候老成这个样子了?

sentences.en: While landing, every style is permitted: the ram in, the massacre , bouncy, or cool feet.
sentences.cn: 当着陆的时候, 所有的风格都是允许的: 快速奔跑, 毁坏性跳跃, 弹性跳跃或者花式脚法跳跃.

words.tran_cn: 保镖；巨大的东西；跳跃的人；吹牛者
有弹性的；快活的；精神饱满的；自大的

trans.tran_cn: 快活的，精神的，有弹性的，自大的
trans.tran_en: a bouncy ball etc quickly moves away from a surface after it has hit it
